title: Please consider adding an on-enemy champion-hit effect like Veigars passive to Gangplank Serpents
body:
I think that would be a healthy playstyle for him.  No bonus gold just Silver Serpents, maybe even at a reduced amount?

I also think it would be even more healthy if {{champion:75}} could get at least 1-2 stacks on-enemy champion-hit as well, but I like {{champion:41}} way more so he gets the headline :P

But yea, I think it was a great addition to {{champion:45}} kit and would love to see it on GP/Susan.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body: Those champions are unique in their own way. Making them all have some similar stacking ability would be bland and unappealing. Those 3 champions have completely different kits to their stacking.
